text:
Hello Everyone!!

I need a help in 'hs_lastmodifieddate' in deals

When we add associated companies under a deal the hs_lastmodifieddate doesnt get updated, since i have read the forums it states that HubSpot doesnt consider that as property change but i need to trigger it when the associated companies added under a deal,

Could you please anyone help me with this??? please:slightly_smiling_face:

Hi there,
What about creating a custom deal property “Number of associated companies” ? You could trigger your WF or whatever based on that.

Hi Team,
I have deleted a few fields in HubSpot that are not visible in UI but when I am trying to fetch data using API, I am getting a few of the deleted fields as a response. Please help me get it resolved.

Hi everyone,

When I run the following endpoint:

`<https://api.hubapi.com/files/v3/files/112892509882/signed-url>`

I get back the following object:

```{
    "expiresAt": "2024-08-31T10:13:11.643Z",
    "url": "<https://26902735.cdnp1.HubSpotusercontent-eu1.net/hubfs/26902735/form-uploads/8159f47c-da98-4728-91e9-d2351e531081/cf48589c-0b14-4330-806e-f889230f077e-learning_support_or_social_emotional_needs_documents__new_-Screenshot-2024-03-27-132514.png?Expires=1725099191&Signature=Me~BiMACjTCmlFky2TDLnmNlscBP6SFHrh83hor78ocjA30q2dMnQMSIU5pbb797WAVOJhAK5uCPlZzzHJBG4YeH4QRKSY2~TfyZwnUcCNDCq9Y7NIAFa3sFwEtla~VIcJTxYeOk0VaAGmAzEw245XlbcDOIm0doYYB0g7XFFLNAsdiLg-G0AC7kbStnfEKO2XySTasjYvqvhYOLd4GfBa2Z9Se9OfVwELY8RqjX3UWxq7hFVsFrnDIrEQZR7jS-sKG2GZKF7fPxBrYaRLc4oXCDI1ZFKBjLMw5YdvE~6AyV1pZ6~hW5lkXkmva08BtBiaedverxJTbvLidP0HOVXw__&Key-Pair-Id=K3960A808T2GLK>",
    "name": "cf48589c-0b14-4330-806e-f889230f077e-learning_support_or_social_emotional_needs_documents__new_-Screenshot-2024-03-27-132514",
    "extension": "png",
    "type": "IMG",
    "size": 546053,
    "height": 651,
    "width": 617
}```
When I try to open the `url` in my browser, I get a `400` error. Does anyone know why this is happening?

The file I'm trying to view is marked as sensitive in HubSpot. However, I'm at least expecting that we can view it via a `signed-url`.

Hi <@U06K19BGMNE>

It's great thank you for your guidance. it works
I’m getting a 403 / 405 error when trying to publish pages. happening for my team and client as well. Anyone else?

Happy Friday everyone :wave:

Exciting news! We have launched our official HubSpot for Developers LinkedIn page and we'd love for you to join our growing community there.

Why follow? :thinking_face:

• Stay updated on the latest HubSpot developer tools and features 
• Get insider tips and explore best practices

• Be the first to know about upcoming events and webinars

Is there a way to sync all productions users, teams, roles into a development sandbox account?

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!

What is happening with Design Manager ? :melting_face:
